description.value:
A shining wayfinder is a polished silver compass blessed by the power of benevolent deities. It has the usual functions of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wayfinder], except instead of an activation to cast light, the shining wayfinder has the following two activations.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You hold the wayfinder and ask for guidance. The wayfinder casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Guidance] on you.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon the wayfinder's divine blessings for yourself and your allies. The wayfinder casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bless], with an emanation centered on itself. Once per turn, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet.
